# shareParticipants(for:)

**Instance Method**

Fetches share participants matching the provided lookup infos.

## Declaration

```swift
func shareParticipants(for lookupInfos: [CKUserIdentity.LookupInfo]) async throws -> [CKUserIdentity.LookupInfo : Result<CKShare.Participant, any Error>]
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchShareParticipantsOperation] is the more configurable, [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKOperation]-based alternative to this function
